Constructor Detail

ExternalSort

public ExternalSort(Operator operator,
                    StorageManager sm,
                    int[] slots,
                    int buffers)
             throws EngineException
Constructs a new external sort operator.

Parameters:
operator - the input operator.
sm - the storage manager.
slots - the indexes of the sort keys.
buffers - the number of buffers (i.e., run files) to be used for the sort.
Throws:
EngineException - thrown whenever the sort operator cannot be properly initialized.
